IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE IS TO PROVIDE HOUSING TO LOW INCOME ELDERLY AND HANDICAPPED INDIVIDUALS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ORGANIZATION'S PRIMARY EXEMPT PURPOSE IS TO PROVIDE HOUSING THROUGH A 149-UNIT APARTMENT COMPLEX TO INDIVIDUALS, EITHER SENIORS WHO ARE AT LEAST 62 YEARS OF AGE OR OTHERS WHO ARE MOBILITY IMPAIRED, SUBSIDIZED UNDER THE DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT. THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDES COMPLETE SUPPORTIVE SERVICES, INCLUDING A HEALTH CENTER, A CONVENIENCE STORE, COFFEE SHOP, HAIR SALON AND TRANSPORTATION.
IRS990.Desc: COSTS INCURRED IN CONNECTION WITH PROVIDING HOUSING TO THE ELDERLY UNDER SECTION 8 OF THE NATIONAL HOUSING ACT AND OTHER SUPPORTIVE SERVICES.

BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: MARK LOISELLE CO SAINT ELIZABETH COMMUNITY

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CORPORATION QUALIFIES AS A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. AS A NOT-FOR-PROFIT ENTITY, THE CORPORATION IS SUBJECT TO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME TAX ("UBIT"), IF APPLICABLE. IN ACCORDANCE WITH FASB ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION ("ASC") 740, INCOME TAXES, THE CORPORATION APPLIES THE "MORE LIKELY THAN NOT" THRESHOLD TO THE RECOGNITION AND DERECOGNITION OF TAX POSITIONS FOR ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE CORPORATION'S TAX POSITIONS AND HAS CONCLUDED THAT THERE WERE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT QUALIFIED FOR EITHER RECOGNITION OR DISCLOSURE IN THESE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION IS ORGANIZED AS A NON-STOCK NOT-FOR-PROFIT CORPORATION WITH MEMBERS WHO HAVE THE RIGHTS TO PARTICIPATE IN THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNANCE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RELATED ORGANIZATION, THE SAINT ELIZABETH COMMUNITY, ESTABLISHES THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWED THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING AND RECOMMENDED TO THE BOARD TO ACCEPT FILING. ALL BOARD MEMBERS WERE PROVIDED WITH A COPY OF THE FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW THE WRITTEN CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ANNUALLY AND DISCLOSE ANY INTERESTS THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS. SIGNED STATEMENTS ARE RETAINED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S CEO AND ARE REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY BOTH THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND CEO.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A SALARY SURVEY WAS COMPLETED FOR THE LEADERSHIP STAFF OF THE SAINT ELIZABETH COMMUNITY (RELATED ORGANIZATION). RESULTS OF THE SURVEY ARE USED BY THE ORGANIZATION AND COMPARED AGAINST INDUSTRY STATISTICS AND INFLATION RATES IN DETERMINING APPROPRIATE COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC AT: 2364 POST ROAD, WARWICK, RI 02886.
THE AUDIT REVIEW PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: SUPPORTS AND MAKES CONTRIBUTIONS TO RELATED ORGANIZATIONS

DisregardedEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: THE SAINT ELIZABETH HOME EAST GREENWICH

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO PROVIDE WORKERS COMPENSATION BENEFITS TO RELATED ORGANIZATIONS
